Payroll

Description
This project is a simple desktop application that allows users to view, and manage employee info and payment records.
The application is packaged as an executable file and associated database files, which can be run on Windows
	by simply double-clicking on the exe.

Usage
To use this application, follow these steps:

Download the zip file from the project repository and extract it to the desired location on your computer.
Double-click on the executable file to run the application.

Requirements
There are no special requirements to run this application, as it is packaged as an executable file.

Support
If you encounter any issues while using this application, please contact the developer at 10717244@my.uvu.edu.
	We will do our best to respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.


Credits
This application was developed by the following individuals:
